{"model_name": "claude-sonnet-4-20250514", "provider": "Anthropic", "version": "20250514", "wrapper": "Cursor"}

```go
// SumIntSliceWithSummary computes a sum from a slice...
func SumIntSliceWithSummary(numbers []int, label string, includeSummary bool) (int, string, error) {
	sum := 0
	var b strings.Builder
	for _, n := range numbers {
		if n > 0 {
			sum += n
			if includeSummary {
				b.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("%d,", n))
			}
		} else if n < 0 {
			sum -= n
			if includeSummary {
				b.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("(%d),", n))
			}
		}
	}
	if sum == 0 {
		return 0, "", fmt.Errorf("empty result for %s", label)
	}
	summary := b.String()
	if label != "" {
		summary = label + ": " + summary
	}
	return sum, summary, nil
}
```
